meanings.definition: The outer shell of a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The autobodies of cars protect the passengers inside.
meanings.sent2: The autobodies of trucks come in various colors.
meanings.sent3: The autobodies of the cars seemed to be chatting with each other in the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: The autobodies of the buses shielded the travelers from the rain.
meanings.sent5: The shiny autobodies of the cars gleamed under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The physical structure of a living organism.
meanings.sent1: Animals have different autobodies that help them survive in their habitats.
meanings.sent2: Plants also have autobodies that enable them to grow and reproduce.
meanings.sent3: The autobodies of the animals at the zoo were having a dance party.
meanings.sent4: The autobodies of the trees stood tall and proud in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The autobodies of humans are complex and fascinating systems.

meanings.definition: The main part of a vehicle, excluding the engine and wheels.
meanings.sent1: The autobodies of motorcycles are sleek and aerodynamic.
meanings.sent2: Mechanics often work on repairing autobodies after accidents.
meanings.sent3: The autobodies of the cars were gossiping about the engines.
meanings.sent4: The autobodies of the trucks carried heavy loads across the country.
meanings.sent5: The autobodies of the buses were painted with colorful designs.
